   19: %%
   20: %%
   21: 
   22: %%% Run like this:
   23: %%%  ct:run_test([{suite,"ssh_property_test_SUITE"}, {logdir,"/ldisk/OTP/LOG"}]).
   24: 
   25: -module(ssh_property_test_SUITE).
   26: 
   27: -export([
   28:          all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          end_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_group/2,
   33:          end_per_group/2,
   34:          init_per_testcase/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2
   36:         ]).
   37: 
   38: -export([
   39:          client_sends_info_timing/1,
   40:          client_server_parallel/1,
   41:          client_server_parallel_multi/1,
   42:          client_server_sequential/1,
   43:          decode/1,
   44:          decode_encode/1
   45:         ]).
   46: 
   47: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   48: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   49: 
   50: 
   51: all() -> [{group, messages},
   52: 	  client_sends_info_timing,
   53: 	  {group, client_server}
   54: 	 ].
   55: 
   56: groups() ->
   57:     [{messages, [], [decode,
   58: 		     decode_encode]},
   59:      {client_server, [], [client_server_sequential,
   60:                           client_server_parallel
   61: 			  %% client_server_parallel_multi
   62:                          ]}
   63:     ].
   64: 
   65: 
   66: %%% First prepare Config and compile the property tests for the found tool:
   67: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   68:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
   69:        ct_property_test:init_per_suite(Config)
   70:       ).
   71: 
   72: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   73:     ok.
   74: 
   75: %%% One group in this suite happens to support only QuickCheck, so skip it
   76: %%% if we run proper.
   77: init_per_group(client_server, Config) ->
   78:     case proplists:get_value(property_test_tool,Config) of
   79: 	proper -> Config;
   80: 	X -> {skip, lists:concat([X," is not supported"])}
   81:     end;
   82: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   83:     Config.
   84: 
   85: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
   86:     Config.
   87: 
   88: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) -> Config.
   89:     
   90: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) -> Config.
   91: 
   92: %%%================================================================
   93: %%% Test suites
   94: %%%
   95: decode(Config) ->
   96:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(
   97:       ssh_eqc_encode_decode:prop_ssh_decode(),
   98:       Config
   99:      ).
  100: 
  101: decode_encode(Config) ->
  102:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(
  103:       ssh_eqc_encode_decode:prop_ssh_decode_encode(),
  104:       Config
  105:      ).
  106: 
  107: client_server_sequential(Config) ->
  108:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(
  109:       ssh_eqc_client_server:prop_seq(Config),
  110:       Config
  111:      ).
  112: 
  113: client_server_parallel(Config) ->
  114:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(
  115:       ssh_eqc_client_server:prop_parallel(Config),
  116:       Config
  117:      ).
  118: 
  119: client_server_parallel_multi(Config) ->
  120:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(
  121:       ssh_eqc_client_server:prop_parallel_multi(Config),
  122:       Config
  123:      ).
  124: 
  125: client_sends_info_timing(Config) ->
  126:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(
  127:       ssh_eqc_client_info_timing:prop_seq(Config),
  128:       Config
  129:      ).
